text: Johannes "Hans" Siegert (10 August 1914 – 25 October 1966) was a football defender on the East German national football team. He was also a defender for FC Mecklenburg Schwerin from 1949–1950. Club career Hans maded 21 appearances for Mecklenburg, and also scoring a goal he played in the DDR-Oberliga which was the East German football top tier league. International career He had 3 caps in 1954. He also was a manager for the side. ==References== * ==External links== * Category:East German footballers Category:1914 births Category:1966 deaths Category:German footballers needing infoboxes Category:Association football defenders
title: Hans Siegert
